structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ORGANIZATION AND GOVERNMENT OF CITIES OF THE FOURTH CLASS (Superseded)

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1980. -- Repealed in part 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 29. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3484, 3553.
